pr_title: Make Hibernate Reactive work w/o Narayana and Agroal

timeline.message: Exclude Agroal and Narayana from Hibernate Reactive dependencies
No longer need to disable the jdbc extension in integration tests
Avoid the TransactionEntityManagers bean to introduce a hard need on the Narayana deployment module
Make the JTA integration depend on the presence of the JTA capability
Help the native-image compiler with an explicit substitution

timeline.bodyText: Could QuarkusJtaPlatformInitiator be resolved from the service registry?
timeline.author: johnaohara

timeline.bodyText: Don't you run the risk of those beans being removed by ArC's optimisation, or are they already unremovable if Agroal is present?
timeline.author: FroMage

replies.bodyText: Good question, I'm checking. Isn't it weird that no test failed?
replies.author: Sanne
